sentences.en: Also the plasmutocyte is divided into trophic nucleus hematocyte and micronuclei hematocyte.
sentences.cn: 其中浆血胞可分为大核浆血胞和小核浆血胞两种.

sentences.en: Caloric value of various layers trophic organs shows: leaf > branch > stem > root.
sentences.cn: 摘要:青冈种群各层次器官热值均表现为: 叶>枝>干>根.

sentences.en: Caloric values of various trophic organ are different with various diameter - classes of the population.
sentences.cn: 各径级样木各器官的热值随径级不同而出现差异.

sentences.en: Conversely , the trophic functions have also been extensively described for the extracellular ATP.
sentences.cn: 但是, 大量报道也指出了细胞外ATP的营养功能.

sentences.en: Neurons are the basic structural, functional, trophic and genetic units of the nervous system.
sentences.cn: 神经元是神经系统结构 、 机能 、 营养及遗传的基本单位.

sentences.en: Reviews on the trophic modes and factors affecting photosynthesis of Spirulina was made.
sentences.cn: 摘要本文就螺旋藻的营养方式及光合作用的影响因素作了较为全面的综述.

sentences.en: the trophic levels of a food chain
These microscopic organisms are assigned a trophic level ( TL ) of 1.
sentences.cn: 这些微生物的营养级为1.

sentences.en: This results in an increasing concentration of insecticide in organisms at the higher trophic levels.
sentences.cn: 这就导致在更高营养级上的有机体中,农药的浓度增加.
主要是营养结构的合理性.
